item.title: Laurie add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "As suburban children we floated at night in swimming pools the temperature of blood; pools the color of Earth as seen from outer space. We would float and be naked—pretending to be embryos, pretending to be fetuses—all of us silent save for the hum of the pool filter. Our minds would be blank and our eyes closed as we floated in warm waters, the distinction between our bodies and our brains reduced to nothing—bathed in chlorine and lit by pure blue lights installed underneath diving boards. Sometimes we would join hands and form a ring like astronauts in space; sometimes when we felt more isolated in our fetal stupor we would bump into each other in the deep end, like twins with whom we didn’t even know we shared a womb. " -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Laurie add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "As I walked, I ran my fingers along the spines of hundreds of books. I let myself be imbued with the smell, with the light that filtered through the cracks or from the glass lanterns embedded in the wooden structure, floating among mirrors and shadows." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Laurie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Laurie add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "It wasn't until I started reading and found books they wouldn't let us read in school that I discovered you could be insane and happy and have a good life without being like everybody else." -- John Waters

item.title: Laurie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Laurie add a quote by Mutant Enemy, Dr Horrible's Sing Along Blog
item.description: "Billy: Hey, this is weird. I ordered one frozen yogurt and they gave me two. You don’t happen to like frozen yogurt do you? Penny: I love it! Billy: You’re kidding! What a crazy, random happenstance!" -- Mutant Enemy, Dr Horrible's Sing Along Blog

item.title: Laurie add a quote by John Donne
item.description:
"No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace as I have seen in one autumnal face."
[<i>The Autumnal</i>]" -- John Donne

item.title: Laurie add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "I stepped into the bookshop and breathed in that perfume of paper and magic that strangely no one had ever thought of bottling." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón
